entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:25 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy mixed with drizzle. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Low 6. Forecast issued 8:21 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:21 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early in the evening. Periods of rain beginning in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 8:21 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
